John Garbero

Software Engineer - Sociologist - Problem Solver

Portfolio

About

As both a software engineer and sociologist, I not only solve-problems using my technical skills, but I approach problems with a knowledge of the social forces involved and how they should be considered. I seek to bring such an approach to the tech world.

I have extensive experience with JavaScript and React, as well as Ruby and Ruby on Rails. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, Redux, Material UI, SQL, PostgreSQL, Heroku, and Git. I also have experience in data analysis software (both quantitative and qualitative), including R, Stata, and NVivo.

Speaking in Poems

This independently developed app allows the client to browse a large selection of poems, favorite and comment any of them, as well as create, edit, and delete their own poems.
